Package index

Chats (Agents)

Functions for initializing chats and extracting valuable information through chat interactions.

initialize_chat()
Initialize Chat

Prompts

Functions for generating prompts and interpolating prompt templates.

prompt_default_sys() prompt_property_investment_user()
Prompts

Types

Functions for defining custom structured output types and input types for custom tools.

type_gmaps_geocode_address() type_gmaps_place_details() type_hunter_email_address() type_property_investment_analysis() type_hud_data() type_owner_contact() type_email_draft()
Types

Tools

Functions defining custom tools that can be registered to chat sessions.

tool_gmaps_places_search() tool_gmaps_geocode_address() tool_hunter_get_email_address()
Tools

Registration

Functions for registering custom function calling tools to chat sessions.

register_tool() register_tools()
Tool Registration

Structured Outputs

Functions for extracting structured outputs from chat interactions.

chat_extract_geocoded_address()
Extract Geocoded Address
chat_extract_hunter_email_address()
Extract Hunter Email Address
chat_extract_owner_company_details()
Extract Owner Company Details
chat_extract_place_details()
Extract Place Details
chat_extract_property_investment_analysis()
Extract Property Investment Analysis Results

Google Maps API Integration

Functions for interacting with Google Maps services, including geocoding and place search.

gmaps_extract_place_info()
Extract Place Information
gmaps_find_best_match()
Determine the Best Match from Multiple Places
gmaps_geocode_address()
Geocode Address
gmaps_places_search()
Google Maps Places Search

Hunter.io API Integration

Functions for interacting with the Hunter.io API for email address retrieval.

hunter_get_company_domain()
Get Company Domain via Hunter.io
hunter_get_email_address()
Get Email Address via Hunter.io
hunter_parse_email_response()
Parse Hunter.io Email Response

Configuration

Functions for setting and getting API keys for various services.

get_openai_api_key() set_openai_api_key() get_gemini_api_key() set_gemini_api_key() get_gmaps_api_key() set_gmaps_api_key() get_hunterio_api_key() set_hunterio_api_key()
Configuration
get_domain_from_url()
Get Domain from URL
get_full_address()

Validation

Functions to validate inputs, such as addresses, domains, and more.

validate_email_regex() validate_email_mx() validate_domain()
Email Address and Domain Server Validation
validate_address()
Validate Address Format

Miscellaneous utility functions that perform various checks and operations.

Check Functions

Miscellaneous utility functions that perform various checks and operations.
